minesweeper.gui

Class GameListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • minesweeper.gui.GameListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MouseListener, EventListener

    public class GameListener
extends Object
implements MouseListener
    The main listener class of the game. Activates after either the right or left mouse button has been released updates the GUI with the information gathered from gameLogic
    Author:
    juri

      • addStatusLabel

        public void addStatusLabel(JLabel status)
        This method is used by the GUI to add the status JLabel after the GameListener has already been created.
        Parameters:
        status - JLabel that shows if the game is ongoing/won/lost
